name: Send new CallRail call data to Google Sheets
description:
Every time you received a new inbound phone call in CallRail, Make will automatically send phone call data to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1isWzm5IzbhjsaVomoPrSvBfoDZOBc0DmZiDHgy2LU1g/edit?usp=sharing)
